```{r}
install.packages('Ryacas')
install.packages('Ryacas0')
library(Ryacas)
library(Ryacas0)
```

```{r}
#limit
yac_str("Limit(x,0) ((x^4 - x^2)/(x^3 + x^2)) * ((sin(x)/(x)) + (cos(x))")

```


```{r}
#diferensiasi
yac_expr("D(x) (sin(x)^2/x^2)*(x+1)")
```

```{r}
#integral
library(Ryacas0)

x <- Sym("x")
integrate(x^2 * cos(x^3 + pi) * sin(x^3 + pi), x)
```
